title: On-Chain Analysis Reveals Tesla Has 11,509 Bitcoins and Spacex Owns 8,285 BTC, Says Arkham
description: Crypto analytics firm Arkham claims to have identified the bitcoin holdings of Elon Musk’s companies, Tesla and Spacex. “The on-chain fund flows we’ve identified match financial statements from Tesla and Spacex,” the firm detailed, stating: “We are the first to publicly identify these holdings on chain.” Bitcoin Holdings of Tesla and Spacex Crypto analytics firm […]

title: USDC bulls trigger DeeStream rally, as SHIB skyrockets pre-Bitcoin halving
description: This alignment of market movements showcases DeeStream's (DST) significant potential and timing, positioning it as a standout presale event in the lead-up to the Bitcoin (BTC) halving. #partnercontent
